tree.title: Monitoring Report Decision Tree
tree.description: Decision Tree for Acting on Internal Monitoring Reports from the General Manager

branch.content: Is the Operational Definition/ Interpretation reasonable?
Reschedule the item for the next meeting. See board process and / or board-gm relations policies.
Is there adequate data to determine compliance/ accomplishment?

Not Accepted - Board discusses Severity, Implications and Trends (SIT) Board considers a range of responses depending on SIT:
  • Request information
  • Schedule additional follow-up monitoring
  • Increase frequency of monitoring
  • Consequences for the GM
Did the board decide to impose consequences on the GM?

Accepted with acknowledgement of non-compliance and consequences (specify). -- or -- Not accepted with consequences (specify).
Document the Board's decisions in the meeting minutes.

Accepted with acknowledgement of non-compliance.
Monitoring process is complete. Document the Board's decisions in the meeting minutes.
Policy Reflection: Is this the policy we want?
Finished You are so awesome. Have some cake!
Assess the Policy Schedule time on a future agenda to discuss this policy.
